name: simplyimport
description: Export-less imports for JS/Coffee files featuring conditional, inline, & minified imports
author: danielkalen

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run prependbin && npm run makeexec
scripts.compile: npm run compile:module && npm run compile:bin
scripts.prependbin: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - forCoverage/cli.js > forCoverage/bin && rm -rf forCoverage/cli.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build && forCoverage=true istanbul cover --dir test/coverage/node node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_mocha_opts && npm run coverage:badge
